author: Times Of India
title: US unloads on China as Covid puts 22m out of work
description: The Trump administration on Wednesday unloaded on China for purportedly making the Covid-19 virus in a lab in Wuhan and accidentally leaking it, even as the pandemic it has put 22 million Americans out of work, decimating all jobs created since the 2008 reces…
